Blog.post: HEy..... It's another day.n i was hopeing tat todai would be a relli cool n fun dai but instead..i got into soo pissed off.! Firstly,its cauz i tried calling certain ppl. jux ta start a conversation n they all coincedentally did not pick up my caLL...arGH how irritateing.esP.when 1 off them is leaveing next Mondai..ta AusTralia..haiz....Secondly im pissed off cauz i lost 1 off my close friends n i dont noe whether or not i should forgive her???i mean i dun want ta be mean..... :( n like yar.I jux feel relli down rite now,sometimez i feel tat my world jux got darker..LOL !! but yar seriously i relli do think so tat the world jux got darker.lately alot off SHiT have been happening.Like for example i had ta reject someone tat i shall not name..haiz...jux like someone told me life can be such a BItCH.?!?! Wad da heLL i noe i'm not alone yeh??? there must be otherz too out there tat think tat life SUCKZ...ya? Oh well i'm missing my close friends tat im used ta talk ta at night...bud they are all busy(i guess?) OH wEll at leAst im haveing a sleep over now...HaHA...hopefully we'll have fun....HEhE...Cant wait for tomorrow !!!! Im going ta watch HARRY POTTER YAhoo !!!!!! HAha... at least there'z still something tat life is worth waiting for...?

Hey... THe holidaiz are here n i've not been doin anything....Haiz..todai i had dance it wazz so farny and painfull,ms Quninne made us walk on our pointy toes..OuCh !!! my leg hurts cauz of tat.Not only tat she made us(dance gurlz) walk n run like tat for the whole two hours...GOsH?!?! the farny part waz there waz this sec.1 gurl tat waz relli trying her BEST ta how oFF...weLL ya noe wad?SHe tried tOO hard cauz she did a mistake n like it waz farny cauz while running on her tippy toes her thights split..haha..(i noe im mean..)bud i wazz not the only gurl tat laughed at her.anywaiz tat gurl waz such a ATTENTION SEEKER n i hate ppl who r like tat.oh ya we did cart wheelz tadai too,my head is still spining after all tat turning..ms Quninne made us do cart wheelz from one end of da Audi. till da other end.I noe she enjoyed watching us make a fool of our selves.!!.EVIL wOman.!!. Taz not all Ms Quninne did,she made all of us do splitz n made sure we could do it properly....my LeG is SO PainFuLL.Tomorrow is another day wid her..but tomorrow i'll be haveing dance wid the seniors.MUAhaHahaha...(they'll be doing the same thing as us too..cart wheelz,splitz,walk on our tippy toes,and other ballerina stuff) HehE...i cant wait till Saturdai,cauz i'll be going ta watch HARRY POTTER."YePee!!!!" hey for those tat have watched it waz it COoL???? i bet so yeah???? haha...the next movie tat i reLLi want ta watch is da COnFESSION's Of a TEenagE draMa QuEEN...hehe...any 1 wanna cm???? im dyeing ta watch it...

hEy..... Sup???? its a Saturdai how cOol! i have nothing to write abt.im jux slacking stuck at home cauz of the rain,LOL.. school waz so crappy..so many CraP happened n it got me relli upset.n there are SoOo many problems tat i have 2 deal wid...haiZ..
